text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa participates in the<n>summer
festival during camp.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While the other Umamusume tire out<n>and take a
break to rest, El Condor Pasa<n>continues dancing
alone to entertain<n>everyone.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In doing so, she finally understands what<n>Silence
Suzuka meant about El Condor<n>Pasa possessing a
special power.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her victories and performances are all<n>for the
sake of making people happy. To<n>that end, she'll
do her best no matter<n>the circumstances. That's
her true power.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
El Condor Pasa's dream is to entertain<n>everyone.
Together, we offer a prayer to<n>her mask, the
symbol of her dreams.
